definition: the quality of being steady or securely and immovably fixed in place
details:
noun
- the quality of being steady or securely and immovably fixed in place
= synonyms: steadiness
- the trait of being resolute
= synonyms: resolution
- the property of being unyielding to the touch
- the muscle tone of healthy tissue
= example: the muscle tone of healthy tissue
= synonyms: soundness
